backend/main.mo: Actor managing contact form entries with validation, storage in a list, and query access.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to related files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for all major frontend files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML template mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with routes for all pages wrapped in SiteLayout.
frontend/src/components/ContactForm.tsx: Form component with client-side validation, success/error states, and backend submission.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Footer showing company info, navigation links, services list, and contact details.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Responsive header with logo, desktop navigation, and mobile drawer menu with active-state styling.
frontend/src/components/SiteLayout.tsx: Page layout wrapper rendering header, routed content, and footer.
frontend/src/data/projects.ts: Defines a Project interface and exports a list of sample solar project entries with details and benefits.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor instance tied to the user's identity, refetching queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, loading stored identities, handling login/logout, and exposing auth status.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines a mutation hook for submitting a contact form entry through the backend actor and invalidates related queries on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color variables, theming rules, and base typography styles.
frontend/src/lib/seo.ts: Utility for setting document title and meta tags, including Open Graph tags for SEO.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with SEO metadata, company overview, vision, and mission content.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders the Contact page with SEO metadata, contact details, and a contact form component.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page component with hero, service highlights, benefits, testimonials and SEO setup.
frontend/src/pages/ProjectsPage.tsx: Projects portfolio page displaying stats and a gallery of project cards with images and details.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Services page listing detailed solar service offerings with icons, descriptions, and feature lists, plus SEO setup.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme colors, typography, animations, containers, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing site goals, requirements, architecture notes, features and image needs for GKV Smart Energy website.
